text: Allen Ingvar Olson (born November 5, 1938) is an American Republican politician and attorney. He was the 28th Governor of North Dakota from 1981 to 1985. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:American Presbyterians Category:Governors of North Dakota Category:Living people Category:Lawyers from North Dakota Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Allen I. Olson
